titles.title: Dismissing the election contest relating to the office of Representative from the Fourteenth Congressional District of Illinois.
Dismissing the election contest relating to the office of Representative from the Fourteenth Congressional District of Illinois.

action.text: The House Committee on House Administration reported an original measure, H. Rept. 117-28, by Ms. Lofgren.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 15.

vote.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 380, H. Res. 379 is considered passed House.

bill.summary: This resolution dismisses the election contest relating to the office of Representative from the 14th Congressional District of Illinois.
